presets.hide_all_dates:
# Hide any values for all 6 date fields
hide due date
hide scheduled date
hide start date
hide created date
hide done date
hide cancelled date
presets.hide_buttons:
# Hide postpone, edit and backinks
hide postpone button
hide edit button
hide backlinks
presets.hide_other_fields:
# Hide all the non-date fields, keep tags
hide id
hide depends on
hide recurrence rule
hide on completion
hide priority
presets.just_the_description_and_tags:
# Show only description and any tags
preset hide_all_dates
preset hide_other_fields
preset hide_buttons
presets.just_the_description:
# Show only description, not even the tags
preset just_the_description_and_tags
hide tags
presets.filter_by_context: filter by function let fn = (ctx) => task.tags.includes(`#context/${ctx}`); return fn

globalQuery:
# Exclude templates files:
root does not include _meta

# Ignore the sample tasks that demonstrate Theme and Snippet support:
path does not include Manual Testing/SlrVb's Alternative Checkboxes
path does not include Styling/Snippet -
path does not include Styling/Theme -
